content.raw:
Thanks @andres_fortier and @chapulina ! I addressed your comments:

* Reversed the order of the simulations. Most recent simulations are shown first.
* Changed the default title to "team-XXX", where team is going to be a field of the simulator data and XXX is the resource number. If the team is undefined, it shows the old title "srcsimulations-XXX". PR for this is [here](#!/osrf/cloudsim-portal/pull-requests/91/add-team-name-to-srcsimulation-resource/diff). Thanks a lot @chapulina !
* Show when there are no rounds for the constellation.
* Imported Moment library to handle time conversions from seconds to H:mm:ss. This is only for display.
* General cleanup.

ptal @preyna and @chapulina 

Some screenshots of the changes:

* Team name using mock data.

![screencapture-localhost-8080-src-results-1496411234014.png](https://bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/751759355-screencapture-localhost-8080-src-results-1496411234014.png 'screencapture-localhost-8080-src-results-1496411234014.png')

* No tasks message. Notice that since the "team" parameter in the simulation is undefined, it's simulation name is shown.

![screencapture-localhost-8080-src-results-1496411294440.png](https://bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/4146662499-screencapture-localhost-8080-src-results-1496411294440.png 'screencapture-localhost-8080-src-results-1496411294440.png')

* Tasks

    ![screencapture-localhost-8080-src-results-1496411315750.png](https://bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/3408249573-screencapture-localhost-8080-src-results-1496411315750.png 'screencapture-localhost-8080-src-results-1496411315750.png')

    

‌
content.html:
Thanks @andres_fortier and @chapulina ! I addressed your comments:

  • Reversed the order of the simulations. Most recent simulations are shown first.
  • Changed the default title to "team-XXX", where team is going to be a field of the simulator data and XXX is the resource number. If the team is undefined, it shows the old title "srcsimulations-XXX". PR for this is here. Thanks a lot @chapulina !
  • Show when there are no rounds for the constellation.
  • Imported Moment library to handle time conversions from seconds to H:mm:ss. This is only for display.
  • General cleanup.

ptal @preyna and @chapulina

Some screenshots of the changes:

  • Team name using mock data.

  • No tasks message. Notice that since the "team" parameter in the simulation is undefined, it's simulation name is shown.

  • Tasks

‌
